emails.you-sent: Here is the information you have sent us

under-age.legend: I am under 18 and attempted collection without my Responsible Adult
under-age.label: I am under 18 and attempted collection without my Responsible Adult

non-identity.legend: My identity could not be confirmed
non-identity.label: My identity could not be confirmed

others-identity.legend: The identity of someone collecting on my behalf could not be confirmed
others-identity.label: The identity of someone collecting on my behalf could not be confirmed

others-auth.legend: The Home Office did not authorise someone else to collect on my behalf
others-auth.label: The Home Office did not authorise someone else to collect on my behalf

passport-family.legend: The vingette in my passport is not linked to my family
passport-family.label: The vingette in my passport is not linked to my family

passport-stamp.legend: My passport does not contain a valid entry stamp
passport-stamp.label: My passport does not contain a valid entry stamp

delivery-details.label: If the courier could have problems delivering to this address, for example there's no door number, then let us know and we'll contact them. (optional)

address-street.label: House name or number and street

no-email.label: I do not have an email address

personal-details.subheader: We need these details to review the problem.

check-details.header: Is the information you have given us correct?
check-details.subheader: Check and make sure the information below is right. If it isn't you can change it here.

paragraphs.one: We will now review the information you have given us to find out why there was a problem with your BRP collection.

first-page.header: This page shows you how to use simple question types
first-page.description: The next pages will demonstrate more complex features

example-radio.required: Tell us which is your favourite superhero

example-dob.required: Enter the superhero's date of birth
example-dob.future: The date is in the future
example-dob.format: Enter the collection date in the correct format

default.title: Sorry, something went wrong
default.message: A server exception occurred. Please try again.

session.title: Sorry, you'll have to start again
session.message: You haven't entered any details for 20 minutes, so we have cleared your information to keep it secure.
